hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: file_list
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
# Jenkins backup eval: find /var/lib/jenkins/jobs -name config.xml # Confluence backup eval: find /var/atlassian/application-data/confluence/backups/ -name *.zip -printf '%T@ %p\n' | sort -n | tail -n 1 | awk -F' ' '{print $2}' # JIRA backup eval: find /var/atlassian/application-data/jira/export/ -name *.zip -printf '%T@ %p\n' | sort -n | tail -n 1 | awk -F' ' '{print $2}'
# apache /etc/apache2/sites-enabled /etc/httpd/conf.d

# ssh /root/.ssh/authorized_keys /home/centos/authorized_keys /home/ubuntu/authorized_keys
# wiki /var/www/oscgc-wiki/data/pages
# general /opt/devops/

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v1" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_jenkins/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="jenkins/collect_files.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_jenkins/$download_file"
